data.enText: absence makes the heart grow fonder
used to say that when you are away from sb that you love, you love them even more
not present in a situation or place, when it is obvious that you should be there
data.chText: （本应在场）因缺席而招人注意

data.enText: When it came to cleaning up afterwards, Anne was conspicuous by her absence.
data.chText: 后来到做扫除时，本应在场的安妮却因为不在而引起了注意。

example: he was surprised by the absence of any explanation

tr: the occurrence of an abrupt, transient loss or impairment of consciousness (which is not subsequently remembered), sometimes with light twitching, fluttering eyelids, etc.
the time interval during which something or somebody is away

partsOfSpeech.dec: ab- 离去,相反 + norm 规则 + -al ...的
ab- 离去,相反 + ort 升起,开始 + -ion 行为,状态
ab- 离去,相反 + s- 存在 + -ent ...的
ab- 离去,相反 + solut 松的,解 + -e
ab- 离去,相反 + sorb 吸
ab- 离去,相反 + use v.用

partsOfSpeech.d: 废除，废止(法律、制度、习俗等)
partsOfSpeech.dec: ab- 离去,相反 + ol- 生长,滋养 + -ish 造成
ab- 离去,相反 + rupt 打破,破裂
aud 听 + -i- + -ence 性质;状态
differ v.不同 + -ence 性质;状态
refer v.提到 + -ence 性质;状态
sci 知道 + -ence 性质;状态
compet(e) 竞争 + -ence 性质;状态
e- 向外,离开 + vid 看 + -ence 性质;状态
exist v.存在 + -ence 性质;状态
in- 不,无 + depend v.视…而定 + -ence 性质;状态
intel- 在...中间 + lig 选择 + -ence 性质;状态
pati- 忍受 + -ence 性质;状态
prefer v.更喜爱 + -ence 性质;状态
sil- 安静 + -ence 性质;状态
viol 暴力,力量 + -ence 性质;状态
con- 表强调 + fid 信任;信念 + -ence 性质;状态
con- 共同,一起 + sequ 跟随 + -ence 性质;状态
occur 发生 + -r- + -ence 性质;状态
pre- ...前的 + s- 存在 + -ence 性质;状态
resid(e) 住;居留 + -ence 性质;状态
correspond 相应,通信 + -ence 性质;状态
infer v.推断 + -ence 性质;状态
coincide v.同时发生 + -ence 性质;状态
ess 存在 + -ence 性质;状态
in- 在内,进入,使 + cid 落下,降临 + -ence 性质;状态

data.enText: the fact of sb being away from a place where they are usually expected to be; the occasion or period of time when sb is away
The decision was made in my absence (= while I was not there) .
data.chText: 这个决定是我不在的时候作出的。

data.enText: We did not receive any news during his long absence.
data.chText: 我们在他长期离开的时候没有得到一点消息。

data.enText: the fact of sb/sth not existing or not being available; a lack of sth
The case was dismissed in the absence of any definite proof.
data.chText: 此案因缺乏确凿证据而不予受理。

data.enText: the absence of any women on the board of directors
data.chText: 董事会成员中没有女性的现象

data.enText: absence makes the heart grow fonder
used to say that when you are away from sb that you love, you love them even more
not present in a situation or place, when it is obvious that you should be there
data.chText: （本应在场）因缺席而招人注意

data.enText: When it came to cleaning up afterwards, Anne was conspicuous by her absence.
data.chText: 后来到做扫除时，本应在场的安妮却因为不在而引起了注意。

simple_means.memory_skill: ab- 离去,相反 + s- 存在 + -ence 性质;状态

ex.enText: There is no shortage of funds.
The bad harvest led to severe food shortages.
ex.chText: 歉收造成食物严重短缺。

ex.enText: The war was lost because of a shortage of munitions.
ex.chText: 战争因军火不足而失败。

synonyms.bx: 指供小于求，即达不到需要或规定的数量。

ex.enText: She noticed the absence of illustrations in the dictionary.
ex.chText: 她发现那本词典里没有插图。

ex.enText: Please take care of my mother during my absence.
ex.chText: 我不在时，拜托你照看我的母亲。

synonyms.bx: 指某物根本不存在或完全短缺，也指某人未在现场。

ex.enText: Hard work can often make up for a lack of ability.
ex.chText: 努力工作常可弥补能力的不足。

ex.enText: His lack of money kept him from going to the concert.
ex.chText: 他因缺钱不能去听音乐会。

ex.enText: Lack of time prevented me from writing to my parents.
ex.chText: 由于没有时间，我没能给父母写信。

synonyms.bx: 普通用词，指完全没有或不够充足，通常用于抽象事物。

ex.enText: My son's always in want of money.
The kids are unhappy for want of love.
ex.chText: 这些孩子因为缺乏爱而不幸福。

ex.enText: Many families are suffering from want.
ex.chText: 许多家庭正遭受着贫困。

synonyms.bx: 指完全没有或短缺某物，强调所缺之物是必需的东西，使用范围比lack 要窄一些；也指因没有食物、钱等造成的贫困。

example.ex: ...a bundle of letters which had arrived for me in my absence...
example.tran: 我不在期间寄给我的一大堆信件

example.ex: Eleanor would later blame her mother-in-law for her husband's frequent absences.
example.tran: 埃莉诺过后会因丈夫经常不在家而责怪婆婆。

value.def: Someone's absence from a place is the fact that they are not there.

example.ex: The presence or absence of clouds can have an important impact on heat transfer...
example.tran: 有无云层对热量的传递会产生重要的影响。

example.ex: In the absence of a will the courts decide who the guardian is.
example.tran: 在没有遗嘱的情况下，由法庭指定监护人。

value.def: The absence of something from a place is the fact that it is not there or does not exist.

trans: 缺乏，不存在；无…时，缺少…时
